summary: Comprehensive testing completed for Bee It Feedback system. All 41 backend API tests passed (100%). Frontend testing shows all core features working: login for all 3 roles, navigation, dashboards, CRUD operations for feedbacks/users/teams, filters, and role-based permissions.

issues: Filter dropdown options may have overlay interception issues when clicking - works with keyboard navigation

critical_code_review_comments: React useEffect dependency warnings in multiple pages (ActionPlanDetail, ActionPlans, CollaboratorProfile, etc.) - not critical but should be addressed for code quality
seed_data_creation: Seed data endpoint /api/seed creates demo users, teams, feedbacks, action plans, and check-ins
context_for_next_testing_agent: All APIs and UI features are working correctly. Backend tests are in /app/backend/tests/test_beeit_api.py. The system supports 3 user roles (ADMIN, GESTOR, COLABORADOR) with proper permission controls. Dark mode UI is implemented and working well.

backend: User CRUD (list, create, get, update, delete)
Team CRUD (list, create, get, update, delete)
Feedback CRUD (list, create, get, update, delete)
Action Plan CRUD (list, create, get, update, delete)
Notifications list and mark all read
frontend: Role-based UI (new feedback button hidden for colaborador)
